thread.title: Zelda: Breath of the Wild will launch with Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: Zelda: Breath of the Wild will launch with Nintendo Switch

title: Zelda: Breath of the Wild will launch with Nintendo Switch
text:
Zelda: Breath of the Wild will launch with Nintendo Switch 3rd March, on Wii U too. By Tom Phillips Published 13/01/2017 
Nintendo closed this morning's Switch event with confirmation that Zelda: Breath of the Wild will launch alongside Nintendo Switch on 3rd March. 
That goes for the Wii U version, too. The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is also coming to #WiiU on March 3rd. — Nintendo of Europe (@NintendoEurope) January 13, 2017 
We were also treated to a lavish new trailer for the game - featuring our first look at Zelda herself, and a voiceover which sounds like it's from her dad. 
Breath of the Wild's release date is also confirmation of Eurogamer's recent report that the game's launch had been moved up to arrive alongside the console - even though this had previously not been the plan. Games featured in this article
